sen.j: 精華町（せいかちょう）は、京都府の南西端に位置する町。
sen.e: Seika-cho is a town located on the southwestern edge of Kyoto Prefecture.
Seika-cho is a town located on the southwestern edge of Kyoto Prefecture.
Seika-cho is a town located on the southwestern edge of Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 関西文化学術研究都市の中心であり、国立国会図書館関西館、私のしごと館、国際電気通信基礎技術研究所などがある。
sen.e: The town is the center of the Kansai Science City, boasting the Kansai-kan of the National Diet Library, the Vocational Museum, and the Advanced Telecommunications Research Institute International.
The town is the center of the Kansai Science City, boasting the Kansai-kan of the National Diet Library, the Vocational Museum, and the Advanced Telecommunications Research Institute International.
The town is the center of the Kansai Science City, boasting the Kansai-kan of the National Diet Library, the Vocational Museum, and the Advanced Telecommunications Research Institute International.

sen.j: イチゴが特産。
sen.e: Strawberries are specialty crops.
Strawberries are their specialty crop.
Strawberries are their specialty crop.

sen.j: 役場の位置は。
sen.e: The location of the municipal office is:
sen.cmt: 現在のWikipediaを参照してみたのですが、「役場の位置は」以下、日本語文で抜けがあるようです。
sen.e: The location of the municipal office is:
The location of the municipal office is:

sen.j: 西の京阪奈丘陵と東の木津川に挟まれ南北に延びる地帯である。
sen.e: Seika-cho is located in the area stretching from south to north between Keihanna Hills in the west and the Kizu-kawa River in the east.
Seika-cho is located in the area stretching from south to north between Keihanna Hills in the west and Kizu-kawa River in the east.
Seika-cho is located in the area stretching from south to north between Keihanna Hills in the west and the Kizu-gawa River in the east.
sen.cmt: 木津川→Kizu-rgawa River としました。"Kizu-gawa River"→"the Kizu-gawa River"に変更しました。

sen.j: 近年は関西文化学術研究都市として、更に大阪市や京都市、奈良市などへのベッドタウンとして丘陵が宅地開発されてきたことから人口流入が増え平成16年度の人口増加数は1290人、人口伸率は4.0%に達している。
sen.e: As a town of the Kansai Science City and a bedroom community for Osaka City, Kyoto City, and Nara City, the hillsides in the area have been developed for housing: as a result, the town has experienced a population influx and increased the population by 1,290 in the fiscal year of 2005 (from April 2004 to March 2005) with a population growth rate of 4.0 percent.

As a town of the Kansai Science City and a bedroom community for Osaka City, Kyoto City, and Nara City, the hillsides in the area have been developed for housing: as a result, the town has experienced a population influx and increased the population by 1,290 in the fiscal year of 2005 (from April 2004 to March 2005) with a population growth rate of 4.0 percent.

As a town of the Kansai Science City and a bedroom community for Osaka City, Kyoto City, and Nara City, the hillsides in the area have been developed for housing: as a result, the town has experienced a population influx and increased the population by 1,290 in the fiscal year of 2005 (from April 2004 to March 2005) with a population growth rate of 4.0 percent.

sen.j: また2005年実施国勢調査速報値によると、人口増加率は29.9%と全国の他の市町村を大きく引き離して1位である（平成17年度に34540人）。
sen.e: Furthermore, according to the preliminary results of the national census taken in 2005, Seika-cho has ranked first in population growth with a growth rate of 29.9 percent (34,540 people in the fiscal year of 2006), far surpassing all other municipalities across Japan.

Furthermore, according to the preliminary results of the national census taken in 2005, Seika-cho has ranked first in population growth with a growth rate of 29.9 percent (34,540 people in the fiscal year of 2006), far surpassing all other municipalities across Japan.

Furthermore, according to the preliminary results of the national census taken in 2005, Seika-cho has ranked first in population growth with a growth rate of 29.9 percent (34,540 people in the fiscal year of 2006), far surpassing all other municipalities across Japan.

sen.j: 10月1日、狛田村、祝園村、稲田村の3村が合併して川西村成立。
sen.e: On October 1, Komada-mura, Hosono-mura, and Inada-mura were combined to form Kawanishi-mura.
On October 1, Komada-mura, Hosono-mura, and Inada-mura were combined to form Kawanishi-mura.
October 1: Komada-mura, Hosono-mura, and Inada-mura were combined to form Kawanishi-mura.

sen.j: 4月1日、山田荘村と川西村が合併して、精華村成立。
sen.e: On April 1, Yamadasho-mura and Kawanishi-mura were combined to form Seika-mura.
On April 1, Yamadasho-mura and Kawanishi-mura were combined to form Seika-mura.
April 1: Yamadasho-mura and Kawanishi-mura were combined to form Seika-mura.

sen.j: 4月1日、町制施行。

April 1: The chosei (grant of township) was implemented.

sen.j: 1月20日、市外局番を077484から07749-4へ変更（山田、柘榴、乾谷は07747で変更なし）

sen.j: 1月1日、電話市外局番を0774へ統一。
